Uses of Class
com.esri.mo2.file.shp.DbfException

Packages that use DbfException
com.esri.mo2.file.shp Support for accessing ESRI shapefiles. 
 

Uses of DbfException in com.esri.mo2.file.shp
 

Subclasses of DbfException in com.esri.mo2.file.shp
 class DbfCodePageException
          Thrown when there is a problem with the encoding or decoding of string values using the current codepage.
 class DbfDuplicateFieldException
          This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add a duplicate field name.
 class DbfFieldNameException
          This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an invalid name.
 class DbfFieldPrecisionException
          This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an incorrect precision.
 class DbfFieldTypeException
          This exception is thrown when an unexpected field type is encountered.
 class DbfFieldValueException
          This exception is thrown when a field's value overflows its width.
 class DbfFieldWidthException
          This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an incorrect width.
 

Methods in com.esri.mo2.file.shp that throw DbfException
 void DbfFile.openReadOnly()
          Opens the file for read-only access.
